This is where I must point out the moral corruption of SciShow. Why does everyone always emphasize "the extreme water pressure"? It is completely irrelevant for anything that hasn't lungs and comes from the surface. This sponge does NOT need a strong skeleton to withstand water pressure from above, maybe currents, but no pressure. Water and all other compact materials aren't compressible, only gasses are!
